transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Ji sir free ho gaye Swapnil baat kar raha hu abhi call kiya tha na aadhe ghante pehle.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Main keh raha tha.
Customer: Haan ji wo ek second ek second hold kijiye.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Hello. Haan haan ji boliye. Ji boliye.
Executive: Main keh raha tha sir abhi aapne na ek feedback diya hua tha hamare yahan pe. To aapki baat hui thi Raksha se jo aapke account ko handle karte hain sir. To kuch problem aa raha tha account manager ko leke.
Customer: Account se problem ye aa rahi hai mere ko jab maine apna ye liya tha aapse kya naam hai India Mart ka package aapne mujhe busy ka software kaha tha che mahine ke liye free denge.
Executive: Kaun sa subscription busy subscription?
Customer: Busy ka busy ka ji haan.
Executive: But abhi tak mere ko aapne available karwaya nahi hai main kai baar is cheez ko aap logo ko keh chuka hu.
Customer: Aapne India Mart jab join kiya tha to busy subscription kisne sales person ne jo aaye the unhone bola tha aapko.
Customer: Haan jo sales person aaye the unhone kaha tha six month ka aapko busy ka software free milega aapko isme.
Executive: To aapke address kya aaye the wo?
Customer: Ji ji bilkul.
Executive: Uske liye sir mujhe actually escalate karna padega pata karna padega ki ye abhi aapke matlab catalog ke sath implement hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Ab wo sir ye sir unke sath bhi yahi issue ho raha hai jo madam baat karti hai na unhone bhi hum kai baar ye keh chuke hain ki bhaiya aap ye karwaiye but wo karwa nahi pa rahi hai wo yahi hamesha kehti hai main check karwati hu but hota hai nahi wo.
Executive: Achcha. Sir dekhiye wo ek jo aapka concern hai uske liye kyuki hamara kaam service dena hai aapki jo company chal rahi hai na to hum aapki jo leads aati hai inquiries aati hai ya fir account manager products wagera mein agar koi problem hai dekhna ye sari cheeze ka rehta hai sir hai na. Main head office se baat kar raha hu Noida se baat kar raha hu sir. Theek hai. Aapne jo concern open kiya tha matlab jo aapne satisfy nahi kiya matlab I think not satisfy kiya hoga wo Raksha ke liye tha matlab jo aapke account manager hai. Busy wala jo aap concern bata rahe hain definitely uske upar main discuss karta hu ki agar aisa hai to definitely milega aur nahi hai to nahi milega wo jo bhi confirmation hogi wo main aapko bata dunga. Wo confirm kariye na hume ek baar.
Executive: Confirm kar dunga matlab aisa nahi rahega ki aap doubt mein rahe ki mujhe milna milna chahiye tha but mila kyun nahi. Ek baar mujhe khud pata karne dijiye kyuki wo sales jab starting mein jaise aap bol rahe hain unhone bola ki busy product aapko denge che mahine ke liye hai na. To wo main ek apne end pe dekh leta hu hai na aur bataiye sir India Mart se jo service aapko abhi mil rahi hai usme koi agar problem hai to discuss kar lete hain.
Customer: Nahi sir usme koi problem nahi hai actually wo mera beta dekhta hai main nahi to.
Executive: Achcha. Ha jo mera second number hai usse agar aap baat karenge to milenge waha pe aapko.
Executive: Achcha wo India Mart wahi sara handle karte hain.
Customer: Haan wahi handle karte hain.
Executive: To abhi aapne August mein join kiya tha sir jaisa ki main check kar raha hu India Mart.
Customer: Ji ji. Ji bilkul.
Executive: Lagbhag do mahine se jyada ho gaya teesra mahina aa gaya sir. Ji ji. To kaisa chal raha hai matlab aapko pata to hoga.
Customer: Sir isme sir koi matlab lead jo hai wo order mein convert nahi ho paati hai kaafi aage tak baat chalti hai price wagera decide ho jate hain sab ho jate hain last mein customer piche hat jata hai ji batayenge.
Executive: Matlab aapka jo product line hai na sir ye aap uniform wagera mein deal karte hain jitna main samajh pa raha hu hai na.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Achcha ek cheez bataiye ye security uniform mein bhi deal karte hain?
Customer: Ji mainly karte hain security aur housekeeping mein hum.
Executive: Theek hai. To ye abhi ek catalog mein category hai sir jo ki add nahi hai main isko add kara raha hu to isse kya hoga ki aapke paas na calls bhi aati hai sir samne se buyer. To abhi jaise security uniform koi agar search kar raha hoga to aapka catalog dikhta nahi hai sir. But usme kya hai ki wo dikhna start ho jayega ki ha ji Maruti Enterprise is product line mein deal karti hai. Haan main karwa diya na security housekeeping hamare hai hi mainly ji do. Haan ye main aapka add karata hu to usme ye rahega ki buyer aapko na directly phone karta hai to wo jyada generate start kar dega is product ke liye agar search karega to aapki company dikhna start ho jayegi sir. Ji bilkul. To main ye isko add karata hu aur baki jaise aapne bola follow up wagera wali cheez hai dekhiye sir main ek cheez bolunga India Mart aapne join kiya hoga kyuki aapka jo business hai na ye aapka basically bulk mein jata hoga aapke log kharid ke aage bechte honge na. To thoda sa follow up mein jaise aapne bola follow up kaise karte hain aap hi karte hain ya aapke bete karte hain. Sir bete bhi karte hain main bhi kar leta hu customer jaise lead uthate hain jaise aap logo ki aati hai bhai weekly aap 13 lead dete hain hum personal customer ko call karte hain usse baat chit hoti hai aur sample wagera mangate hain hum sample wagera dete hain use online matlab provide karwate hain use rate wagera ki baat hoti hai sab kuch hoti hai at the time order customer piche hat jata hai matlab hamare ko paanch che case aise ho chuke hain. Kahin price wagera ka to dikkat nahi aata hai customer ko. Price ka koi aisa issue nahi hai price ka issue to customer shuru mein starting mein bol dega. Kai baar dekhiye hota kya hai ki customer aap se nahi bolenge aap se jo hai wo simple humse matlab ek tarike se apni uniform design karwata hai logo logo set karwata hai sab uska design lene ke baad ja raha hai. Main aapko isi batata hu Ankur ji jitna main samajhta hu dekhiye is product line mein hota kya hai na jis product mein aap deal karte hain isme log karte kya hai ki aapse jaan liya unhone quotation le li product ka price puch liya wo aapko kabhi ye nahi bolenge ki aapka mehnga hai sir agar koi machine hoti na machine kya hai ek limited supplier dete hain jo badi badi machine hoti hai aur ye jo product line hai jisme aap deal karte hain isme bahut sare supplier deal karte hain sir theek hai to kai baar aisa hota hai ki buyer ne aapko price to diya ab usko ho sakta hai kahin aur se bhi price usne quotation li hogi waha pe price usko sasta mil gaya ab wo aap se ye bolne ko nahi ha matlab bilkul se ek baar price ka main check kara leta hu aapke jo secondary number pe na Raksha se abhi call karaunga unko boliyega thoda price wagera agar discussion kar rahe hain agar kuch updation required hai to price wagera hum update kar denge aur waha se ho sakta hai thoda sa farak aa jaye sir hai na. Chaliye main sir baat karta hu main dekhta hu is bare mein. Theek hai aur busy wala jo aapne bola ek baar main dekh leta hu sir agar jo bhi hoga yes ya no milna hai nahi milna hai ya mila tha nahi mila kya reason hai jo bhi hoga wo ek baar main confirm karke aapko dobara se call karke bataunga theek hai. Chaliye chaliye theek sir. Chaliye sir is call ke baad na aapke paas ek feedback ka mail aayega dobara se mere liye rahega mail aayega sir aapki jo mail id chal rahi hai na hamare yaha pe to wo I think aap use karte honge to abhi aayega please usko satisfy kar dijiyega sir taki ye concern main close kar saku theek hai. Ji ji. Okay theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received Busy software subscription.

- Leads are not converting into orders.



Resolution:

- Executive will escalate Busy software issue.

- Executive will add security uniform category to catalog.

- Executive will have Raksha call about pricing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with Busy software update.

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- busy software, leads, catalog, pricing, follow up
